/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with cars and buses, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun's rays. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, its vast expanse unmarred by clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of grandeur to the everyday hustle and bustle of the city.
